member.name: M:QRCommand.Api.Controllers.QrCodeController.CreateQrCode(QRCommand.Api.Models.QrCodeRequest)
member.summary: Generates a QR code for a given text.
member.param: The QR code generation request details.
member.returns: Returns a QR code image for the given text.

member.summary: Generates a QR code for connecting to a WiFi network.
member.returns: Returns a QR code image for WiFi connection.
